body: Ryosuke, You can't run simulation for more than one year as EPW files contain only one year of data.  However, you can change the number of warmup days that the simulation runs before it starts writing results and this is a such a quick thing to implement so I just added this ability on the Simulation Control component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-FxrWMrAPzgpG9ynxqsOFd2cPTs2zTcUNs3U8bNQnAvpCXI0Ov6UWBzaMKHd3oLt9aODRX4rP6tVYXul8ogyFsmB90zhyxgW/AddedWarmupDays.JPG) See the attached file for an example of how to implement it. -Chris
